title: Design Thinking Application Process for Artificial Intelligence Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A blended (face-to-face/online) program to strengthen AI education design competencies, with a focus on practical problem-solving considering social impact.

learning_goals: Learners can design at least one AI educational module using Design-Based Thinking methodology
Learners develop and evaluate AI educational scenarios for creating social value
Learners can identify three or more participation barriers and solutions in AI education processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
